strip_tags(html)

[Source]

    # File app/models/essence_richtext.rb, line 18
18:   def strip_tags(html)
19:     return html if html.blank?
20:     if html.index("<")
21:       text = ""
22:       tokenizer = HTML::Tokenizer.new(html)
23:       while token = tokenizer.next
24:         node = HTML::Node.parse(nil, 0, 0, token, false)
25:         # result is only the content of any Text nodes
26:         text << node.to_s if node.class == HTML::Text
27:       end
28:       # strip any comments, and if they have a newline at the end (ie. line with
29:       # only a comment) strip that too
30:       text.gsub(/<!--(.*?)-->[\n]?/m, "")
31:     else
32:       html # already plain text
33:     end
34:   end
